skills.description: Frontend The frontend of a software program or website is everything with which the user interacts.

skills.title: UI & UX
skills.description: UI/UX design is constantly evolving with advances in technology and changing user behaviour, designers must stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices to create effective designs.
